reviewText: Once again this is a Very Amazing Dvd filled with Great Tales of Friendship and much more! The Stories on this Awesome Dvd are wonderful and also very amazing too! This is a Great winner and deserves 10 Gold Stars!!

Angelina Ballerina Twirling Tales Review and Giveaway!! Angelina Ballerina is one of my nieces and nephews shoes to watch so I knew that this DVD would be a hit.  It comes out on DVD for the public on November 5, 2013 and would be a great addition to any movie collection.  Angelina Ballerina and her troop of friends take the stage to help kids realize friendship, fun and imagination help you achieve your dreams!

My nieces absolutely adored this video and didn't move the entire time it was on and we have 1 four year old and one 5 year old.  It was a hit with both of them and a few of the older kids watched it with them as well, but were a little "bored" if you will.  But it more appropriate for ages 2-6 year olds. The surprises were amazing and it proved that when you set your mind to something it can really happen.

Episodes include:

  Angelina's Dance Like a Cake Day

  Angelina's Noisy, Messy Lunchtime

  Angelina and the Musical Plant

  Angelina and Her Parents' Dance Lessons

  Angelina's Mother's Day

DVD BONUS FEATURES

  A Dance A Day Dance Club

  1, 2, 3, 4, 5 Karaoke Music Video

  Swing Thing Karaoke Music Video

This great movie will make a fabulous stocking stuffer this Christmas!
My 3.5 y/o granddaughter enjoys the cartoon. It is safe for children with no evidence of aggressiveness or foul language.
Great content for young children. Teaches character development. I highly recommend it.
My daughter is a ballerina,so you can imagine
From my 5 year old...it was artistic in a dancing way. She made mistakes but it was nice. She added the mistakes into a new and good thing.
My granddaughter likes all of the Angelina Ballerina shows.
I'm not a fan. My daughter loves her, though.
My girls loved it. Would definitely watch again!
Great little story. My granddaughters were entranced
My grand daughter loves this movie
These books are wonderful and the seller is superb
The colors are bright my 3yr old loves it . She'll the whole movie and she even tries to dance like them .
I would give it ZERO stars, but my three year old daughter would give it TEN.
My 5 year old granddaughter loves this series!! Very entertaining !
My 5 year old daughter loves this!
My daughter loved Twirling tales.  She has learned so much from Angelina Ballerina.  She can do twirls and jumps.  Thanks
My 4 year old daughter loves this.
My kids love it.  They are so cute !!
Hotel was very run down/dirty I guess it is what is expected with the price
My 4 yr old granddaughter loved it!!!!!
I like it because it teaches you to be a good friend and how to be a good dancer as well
My 3 year old day loves it.

Angelina has a good message. It is very low key and quiet with nice music. It also teaches different dance terms. My granddaughters love it and it is pleasant to watch and listen to unlike many children's shows which are very often loud and annoying.
